I purchased this bracelet two years ago after trying a couple others from Amazon that didn't last.  When I buy one, I put it on and that's it, I wear it constantly until it breaks.This one, is so basic, there is little to go wrong and it is awesome.  When you assemble the metal pin there is a back that goes through the strap, and tightens with the round head part.  This has to be kept tight or like others, it could come apart.  Even better, use Locktite or some glue.  That is the only weakness but mine has not been an issue and remained tight.  When it was new I had a habit of twisting it to keep it tight.I wear this constantly, showers, swimming, car washing, and water has not affected it, but only weathered it to be unique.  TWO YEARS and there is no sign of this failing any time soon.  I would get a couple more to give my pals as they have looked at it.  Brown with gold stud is what I used, when it ever does fail, I'm getting another one!!Just get it, put the stud together at the correct size and make sure it's tight.  Push the stud through the other end and forget it for years!!!

These are excellent bracelets, I'm not sure about what other reviews are that a bad screw. pfft there is no bad screw. When you open the package, the bracelet came in a cute little box, great for gift gifting. on the tag that attaches to the bracelet, you see a little nub (different color) and the same on the bracelet. THAT MEANS YOU CAN CHANGE IT OUT! I WAS DESIGNED LIKE THAT. JEEZE. so yeah it comes in with 2 nubs, the gold, and the gunmetal. the picture doesn't do it justice.  The leather is also very thick, and this will last a lifetime if you know how to care for it and from time to time when you took off the bracelet, tight the screw with your hand. Now if you're lazy and don't want any metal color options, get locktie, dap a tiny dot. that will solve all your issue.  The cons: The black came in an extremely dark dark color. under certain condition it will looks like an extremely dark dark dark brown. not a con to me but just another great things about leather and its also smell great
